p: Methyl chavicol and linalool used for bioassays were purchased from Sigma Aldrich. HPLC grade dichloromethane and acetone were purchased from Merck. Dimethyl-2,2-dichlorovinyl phosphate (DDVP) and Imidacloprid (PESTANAL®) analytical standard were purchased from Sigma Aldrich. Eserine and Fast Blue RR salt were procured from Fluka (Sigma Aldrich). α-Napthyl acetate (α-NA), 2,4-dinitrochlorobenzene (CDNB), Coomassie brilliant blue G-250, pyrogallol, guaiacol, and H 2O 2 were purchased from Shanghai Chemical Industry Co., Ltd, China.
